    IPortGroup.SerialPortSetting
    class for initializing the serial port with connectCOMM
    ITagGroup
    Internal class providing Transponder specific Reader commands, when the Reader is working in Host-Mode.

    Main reader class for the IDENTIFICATION reader family.

Package de.feig.FEDM.Core Description

Version 5.00.00

Copyright © FEIG ELECTRONIC GmbH, All Rights Reserved.

Lange Strasse 4

D-35781 Weilburg

Federal Republic of Germany

phone : +49 6471 31090

fax : +49 6471 310999

e-mail : identification-support@feig.de

Internet : http://www.feig.de  

The Java class library ID OBIDISC4J_API from FEIG ELECTRONIC GmbH represents yet another component for simplifying the development of application programs in Java for IDENTIFICATION Readers.
The Java class library ID OBIDISC4J_API currently supports 32- and 64-Bit Windows and 32- and 64-Bit Linux with installed 32-Bit or 64-Bit Java Runtime Environment (JRE) 5 or higher.
With the beginning of 2017, the previous OBIDISC4J library is downgraded to an implementation layer and wrapped by a new and modern API layer, called OBIDISC4J_API. This new API layer will be extended with new features, like firmware update, and is recommended to be used for new projects.

For more general information, please refer to the manual Tutorial.pdf


Important notes:
You may use this library only if you have first agreed to the licensing terms found on Licensing Agreement.
